t.p: If you close this question, it will be hidden for most users. Only users having a high karma can see closed questions to moderate them.

template.p: Please try to give a substantial answer. If you wanted to comment on the question or answer, just use the commenting tool. Please remember that you can always revise your answers - no need to answer the same question twice. Also, please don't forget to vote - it really helps to select the best questions and answers!

button.t-attf-class: btn btn-primary mt16 #{not question.can_answer and 'karma_required' or ''}

a.t-attf-class: vote_up fa fa-thumbs-up no-decoration #{post.user_vote == 1 and 'text-success' or ''} #{((post.user_vote == 1 and not post.can_downvote) or not post.can_upvote) and 'karma_required' or ''}
vote_down fa fa-thumbs-down no-decoration #{post.user_vote == -1 and 'text-warning' or ''} #{((post.user_vote == -1 and not post.can_upvote) or not post.can_downvote) and 'karma_required' or ''}

div.t-attf-class: row question #{not question.active and 'alert alert-danger' or ''}

a.t-attf-class: favourite_question no-decoration fa fa-2x fa-star #{question.user_favourite and 'forum_favourite_question' or ''}

p.b: The question has been closed for reason:

a.t-attf-class: fa fa-comment-o #{not question.can_comment and 'karma_required text-muted' or ''}
favourite_question no-decoration fa fa-2x fa-star #{question.user_favourite and 'forum_favourite_question' or ''}
accept_answer fa fa-2x fa-check-circle no-decoration #{answer.is_correct and 'oe_answer_true' or 'oe_answer_false'} #{not answer.can_accept and 'karma_required' or ''}
fa fa-comment-o #{not answer.can_comment and 'karma_required text-muted' or ''}
accept_answer fa fa-2x fa-check-circle no-decoration #{answer.is_correct and 'oe_answer_true' or 'oe_answer_false'} #{not answer.can_accept and 'karma_required' or ''}
